name: Eastern Blocks:Re-build - DEMO
description:
The game was prepared for GDevelop Gamejam 1 but we plan to develop the full version of the game in the future. If you are interested follow my profile for more.

Programmed by Brudda

Art, Sounds and Music by Pixel224444

Special thanks to Nathanex for the extra help with the project.

Description

In the game we play the role of Janusz at a construction site who has to deliver a hammer to the person who lost it. Several puzzles await him on his way.

The game has full support for mobile devices.

Controls for PCDescriptionW, S
Use the ladderA, DMovementSpaceJumpLeft Mouse Button (or touch)Interaction with the game
